{/* HERO */}

Faëria

Strategy Dungeon Card Game

{/* WHAT IS IT */}

What is Faëria?

Faëria is a blend of Dungeon Crawler, Strategy and Card Battler. Explore maps, defeat monsters, and build your deck.

{/* HOW TO PLAY */}

How to Play

Choose your hero, enter the dungeon, defeat enemies and earn rewards. Cards determine your actions, use them wisely.
